name: Nitrochondrie
description:
Welcome to Nitrochondrie! 

In this arcade, disgusting racing game, play as Bacterry & Virussel: two high-energy, grungy, agressive micro-organisms hooked on speed and violence. 

Prepare to fight your fucking guts out throughout this local multiplayer, bite-sized experience. It's going to get dirty. Literally. 

Will you become the fastest bacteria that ever existed in this crude world?

Are you ready for Nitrochondrie?
